newsitems.title: TF2 Coaching Central Newbie Cup VII
newsitems.contents: TF2 Coaching Central is back with their seventh North American Newbie 6s Cup, a learning experience and friendly competition for people who are new to competitive 6v6. Players with no to minimal competitive experience will sign up to be placed on a team of six, led by a coach who will teach the ba...
